employee.counselingLocked: Please complete the SC questionnaire first to access Counseling Mode
employee.physicianSupportDesc: The occupational physician can access your data to provide professional support
employee.privacyNotice: Your conversation content with the AI avatar is not stored verbatim. Psychological analysis results are not shown to you; only abstracted work condition information is shared with your manager and HR.
employee.scReminderDesc: Regular SC questionnaires enable more accurate condition management and support.

avatar.title: AI Avatar Dialogue
avatar.privacyNotice: Conversation content is not stored verbatim | Analyzing Work Readiness from facial expression, voice, and text

responses.greeting: Hello! What would you like to talk about today?
responses.followUp1: I see. Could you tell me more about that?
responses.followUp2: That's interesting. How did you feel about it?
responses.followUp3: I understand. Is there anything else on your mind?
responses.followUp4: I see. What do you think about that?

counseling.title: Counseling Mode
counseling.subtitle: Feel free to share
counseling.privacyNotice: Counseling content is not stored verbatim | Not used for Work Readiness analysis

responses.welcome: Welcome to Counseling Mode. This is a safe space to talk. Take a deep breath and relax. What would you like to discuss today?
responses.explore: Let's explore that feeling a bit more. In what specific situations did you feel that way?
responses.insight: That's an important insight. What's the basis for that thought?
responses.reframe: I understand. If you were to look at it differently, what other perspectives could you consider?
responses.validate: I see. What you felt in that situation is a very natural response.
responses.learn: Is there something you can learn from that experience?

questionnaire.title: SC Questionnaire
questionnaire.instructions: For each question, recall your situation over the past month and select the most applicable answer.
questionnaire.notice1: Your responses are not stored verbatim
questionnaire.notice2: Only statistical analysis is performed; individual responses are abstracted
questionnaire.notice3: Specific scores are not displayed to you
questionnaire.notice4: Results are used for organizational improvement
questionnaire.privacyNotice: Survey results are used to improve work conditions and workplace environment. They are never disclosed in a way that identifies individuals.
questionnaire.rawNotSaved: Responses are not stored verbatim. Only statistical analysis is performed, and no scores are displayed to you.

questions.q1: I have a very large amount of work to do
questions.q2: I cannot finish work within working hours
questions.q3: I have to work very hard
questions.q4: I can work at my own pace
questions.q5: I can decide the order and method of my work
questions.q6: My supervisor supports subordinates to demonstrate their abilities
questions.q7: My colleagues help me with my work
questions.q15: I am satisfied with my work
questions.q16: I am satisfied with my home life

history.title: Past Avatar Conversations
history.subtitle: View conversation summaries
history.noHistoryDesc: No conversations recorded for the selected period
history.privacyNotice: Only conversation summaries are displayed. Original conversations are not stored; only abstracted summary information is recorded.

manager.dataNotice: Only 5-level condition ratings and trends are displayed (psychological details hidden)

managerIndividual.title: Individual Details
managerIndividual.dataNotice: Only condition indicators and abstracted work-related data are displayed (psychological/counseling information hidden)
managerIndividual.infoNotice: Only 5-level condition trends and abstracted factors are displayed. Psychological details and raw emotional data are not shown.
managerIndividual.hiddenNotice: Internal evaluation values (0-100) are hidden. Only the 5-level abstracted values are displayed.
managerIndividual.factorNotice: These are abstracted work-related indicators. Personal psychological information is not included.
managerIndividual.trendAnalysis: A declining trend has been observed over the past 3 weeks. Consider checking for changes in workload or environment.
managerIndividual.action2: Recommended to provide an opportunity to discuss work priorities
managerIndividual.action3: Support consultation with HR or occupational physician as needed

hrIndividual.permission: You can view Work Readiness details (0-100), SC category summaries, and abstracted behavioral data. Raw text and psychological details are not displayed.
hrIndividual.analysisNote: A 30-point decline has been observed over the past 2 months. Early intervention is recommended.
hrIndividual.slackPrivacy: Original Slack messages are not stored or displayed. Only extracted text features and sentiment analysis results are shown in abstracted form.
hrIndividual.sentimentNote: Sentiment estimated by AI natural language processing. Negative ratio is higher than usual.
hrIndividual.emotionNote: Emotional trends estimated from vocabulary patterns and context. Anxiety and fatigue indicators are elevated.
hrIndividual.hrNote: Physician recommendations are medical advice. Specific HR measures should be discussed and implemented by the employee, supervisor, and HR.

urgentActions.action1: Urgently schedule 1-on-1 meeting with direct supervisor
urgentActions.action2: Consider arranging occupational physician consultation (employee consent required)

physician.title: Occupational Physician View
physician.subtitle: Only consent-given data viewable
physician.confidentialityDesc: Information displayed on this screen is only viewable with explicit consent from the employee. Counseling summaries, Work Readiness trends, and SC categories are shown, but original conversations and detailed psychological information are not displayed.
physician.recommendationsPlaceholder:
Enter recommendations...
Separate each item with a new line
physician.selectEmployee: Select an employee from the list

physicianConsent.title: Occupational Physician Support Guidance
physicianConsent.description: Your Work Readiness score is lower than usual. Please consent to data viewing to receive professional support from the occupational physician.
physicianConsent.alertMessage: Your Work Readiness score is {{score}}, which is lower than usual.
physicianConsent.supportDesc1: By receiving more specialized support from the occupational physician, we can help improve your health and work condition.
physicianConsent.supportDesc2: By allowing the occupational physician to access your detailed data, they can provide more appropriate advice and support.

privacyItems.confidentiality: The occupational physician has confidentiality obligations and information is strictly managed
privacyItems.noSharing: Information viewed by the physician is not shared with supervisors or HR
privacyItems.revocable: You can revoke consent at any time
privacyItems.noDisadvantage: You will not suffer any disadvantage by not consenting

physicianConsent.confirmQuestion: Do you consent to the occupational physician viewing your data?

notRetainedItems.scRaw: SC Questionnaire Individual Response Raw Text

physicianConsent.title: Physician Consent Dialog Settings
physicianConsent.thresholdDesc: When an employee's Work Readiness score falls below this value, the physician support guidance dialog will be displayed.
physicianConsent.redisplayDesc: Set the period before the dialog is displayed again after an employee selects 'Not Now'.

scGroupAnalysis.title: SC Group Analysis
scGroupAnalysis.subtitle: Organization-Wide Stress Check Analysis
scGroupAnalysis.notice: This data is aggregated in a way that does not identify individuals. Please use it as reference data for organizational improvement and workplace environment enhancement.

deptDescriptions.salesHighLoad: High workload with high stress response tendency
deptDescriptions.devModerateLoad: Moderately high workload and stress response

actions.expandDesc: Consider expanding mentor system and training programs to other departments
actions.additionalDesc: Review resource allocation for departments with high workload
actions.monitorDesc: Continue SC implementation and effectiveness measurement every 3 months

conversations.conv1Summary: Consultation about project progress. Discussed prioritizing new tasks and schedule adjustments.
conversations.conv2Summary: About communication with team members. Explored approaches for smooth collaboration.
conversations.conv3Summary: Reflection on this week's tasks. Organized achievements and areas for improvement.
conversations.conv4Summary: Discussion about long-term career plans. Considered skill development directions.
conversations.conv5Summary: About returning to work after vacation. Organized to approach with a refreshed mindset.
conversations.conv6Summary: Reflection on quarterly goal achievement status. Planned next steps.

mockData.medicalFindings: Consider possibility of adjustment disorder. Continuous monitoring is required.

recommendations.rec2: Consider referral to specialist if needed
recommendations.rec3: Coordinate with HR and supervisor regarding workload adjustment

counselingSessions.session1Summary: Addressed cognitive distortions related to workload. Noticed the thought pattern of 'must be perfect' and discussed realistic goal setting.
counselingSessions.session2Summary: Consulted about decreased sleep quality and concentration issues. Discussed reviewing lifestyle rhythm and stress coping methods.

slackBehavior.responseSpeedDesc: Average response time extended from 2 hours to 4 hours
slackBehavior.postFrequencyDesc: Daily average decreased from 15 to 8 posts
slackBehavior.reactionsDesc: Emoji usage is at normal level
slackBehavior.questionRatioDesc: Question and confirmation frequency is in normal range
slackBehavior.immediateResponseDesc: Immediate response rate decreased from 60% to 35%
